Toni Kukoc scored 19 points in support of Allen Iverson 's 41 and the 76ers roared to a season high in their fifth straight victory, a 121-89 rout of the Seattle SuperSonics. Toni Kukoc played like we expected him to play every game, Allen Iverson said. "We need a lot of that from Toni Kukoc . He's one of those special players that can change a game."
